Catch Me If You Can

Rank: 662


Barely 17 yet- Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor- lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man- who only revels in the pursuit.


Director: Steven Spielberg

Writer: Frank Abagnale Jr., Stan Redding, Jeff Nathanson

Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken

Tags: Caper, Coming,of,Age, Docudrama, Globetrotting Adventure, Period Drama, True Crime, Biography, Crime, Drama
